statements: DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 101 AND diagnosis = 'Flu';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND dob < '1980-01-01';
DELETE FROM Medical_Records WHERE patient_id = 2 AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Research_Team WHERE research_area = 'Oncology' AND physician_lead = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE research_id IN (SELECT research_id FROM research_data WHERE patient_id = 5);
